author: nspiegelberg
msg: Add a command line option to HBaseTest that specifies the table to be read or write
The new option allows HBaseTest to create/read a user-specified table in hbase.
run the test with -tn option and check if the specified table is created.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: import fix for HBASE-2703: web ui broken
Deployed on cluster, and verified master and region server web ui is working as

author: nspiegelberg
msg: hbase shell commands hang in some terminals (such as shell within emacs)
returns 0 for some terminals. This causes code to
get into a inf loop, and eventually run out of JVM memory.
Test Plan: ran hbase/shell commands that were failing before (such as list, describe) from within emacs.

author: nspiegelberg
msg: webapps directory is redundant with hbase-webapps. missed during refactoring
